articles.description: Electron beams that power microscopes have shown the seemingly magical ability to heal microscopic fractures atom by atom.
articles.content: Electron beams can be used to heal nano-fractures in crystals instead of causing further damage to them, as initially expected by researchers who now report their surprise findings. Used to power mic… [+3355 chars]
